b:with.value: data:blog.metaDescription ? data:blog.metaDescription : (data:view.isSingleItem and data:post.snippet ? snippet(data:post.snippet, { length: 147, links: false, linebreaks: false, ellipsis: false }) : (data:blog.pageName ? data:blog.pageName : data:blog.title))

resizeImage((data:sourceUrl not contains "http://" and data:sourceUrl not contains "https://" ? (snippet(data:view.url) contains "https://" ? "https:" : "http:") + data:sourceUrl : data:sourceUrl), 512, "1:1")

resizeImage((data:sourceUrl not contains "http://" and data:sourceUrl not contains "https://" ? (snippet(data:view.url) contains "https://" ? "https:" : "http:") + data:sourceUrl : data:sourceUrl), 1280, "16:9")

{ locale: data:blog.locale.language, siteName: data:blog.title, title: (data:blog.pageName ? data:blog.pageName : data:blog.title), url: data:blog.url.canonical, type: (data:view.isMultipleItems ? "website" : "article"), description: (data:blog.metaDescription ? data:blog.metaDescription : (data:view.isSingleItem and data:post.snippet ? snippet(data:post.snippet, { length: 147, links: false, linebreaks: false, ellipsis: false }) : (data:blog.pageName ? data:blog.pageName : data:blog.title))) }

resizeImage((data:sourceUrl not contains "http://" and data:sourceUrl not contains "https://" ? (snippet(data:view.url) contains "https://" ? "https:" : "http:") + data:sourceUrl : data:sourceUrl), 1280, "16:9")

{ title: (data:blog.pageName ? data:blog.pageName : data:blog.title), url: data:blog.url.canonical, description: (data:blog.metaDescription ? data:blog.metaDescription : (data:view.isSingleItem and data:post.snippet ? snippet(data:post.snippet, { length: 147, links: false, linebreaks: false, ellipsis: false }) : (data:blog.pageName ? data:blog.pageName : data:blog.title))), card: "summary_large_image" }

resizeImage((data:sourceUrl not contains "http://" and data:sourceUrl not contains "https://" ? (snippet(data:view.url) contains "https://" ? "https:" : "http:") + data:sourceUrl : data:sourceUrl), 1280, "16:9")

data:post.comments map (c => { id: data:c.id, body: data:c.body, timestamp: data:c.timestamp, timestampMs: data:c.timestampValue, isDeleted: data:c.isDeleted, deleteUrl: data:c.deleteUrl, inReplyTo: data:c.inReplyTo, adminClass: data:c.adminClass, author: { name: data:c.author, avatar: data:c.authorAvatarSrc, url: data:c.authorUrl, isAnonymous: (data:c.author == "Anonymous" and !data:c.authorUrl), isPostAuthor: (data:post.author.name == data:c.author and (data:c.extraIconClass != "" or data:c.authorClass != "")) } })

data:level1Comments map (c => { level: 1, id: data:c.id, body: data:c.body, timestamp: data:c.timestamp, timestampMs: data:c.timestampMs, isDeleted: data:c.isDeleted, deleteUrl: data:c.deleteUrl, adminClass: data:c.adminClass, author: data:c.author, replies: (data:allComments filter (e => data:e.inReplyTo == data:c.id) map (r => { level: 2, id: data:r.id, body: data:r.body, timestamp: data:r.timestamp, timestampMs: data:r.timestampMs, isDeleted: data:r.isDeleted, deleteUrl: data:r.deleteUrl, inReplyTo: data:r.inReplyTo, adminClass: data:r.adminClass, author: data:r.author, parent: data:c })) })

b:with.value: data:properties map (p => data:links filter (l => l.name == data:p and l.target not in ["https://", "#"] and (l.target + "") not contains "goes here")) filter (a => a.notEmpty) map(a => { name: data:a.last.name, value: data:a.last.target })
data:properties map (p => { name: data:p, value: ((data:links filter (l => l.name == data:p and l.target not in ["https://", "#"])).last.target) })
